articles.title: Frida Kahlo self-portrait sells for record-breaking $55m
articles.description: The auction shattered the previous record for a price tag fetched for a work by a female artist.

articles.title: Man sought after woman found with gunshot wound in downtown Toronto
articles.description: Police are searching for a male suspect after a woman was shot in downtown Toronto. Investigators say a woman was found suffering from a gunshot wound in the Mutual Street and Queen Street East area around 10 p.m. Thursday. She was transported to the hospital in serious condition. articles.title: 4 people hospitalized after grizzly bear attack in Bella Coola
articles.description: BC Emergency Health Services says that two people are in critical condition, two in serious condition, and 7 people were treated at the scene.

articles.title: Several students injured after grizzly bear attack in Bella Coola: RCMP
articles.description: The BC Conservation Officer Service (BCCOS) says it is responding to a reported grizzly bear attack in Bella Coola.

articles.description: A grizzly bear has attacked a group of elementary school students and teachers in the B.C. central coast community of Bella Coola, leaving two people critically injured and two others seriously hurt. articles.title: Edmonton unveils proposed fall budget
articles.description: Edmonton homeowners will see a 6.4 per cent property tax increase in 2026, adding about $230 a year to the average bill, after the city released its proposed budget Thursday. articles.title: Two arrested in death of Edmonton man
articles.description: Two men have been charged with manslaughter in connection with the 2023 death of Edmonton resident Ryker Dingman. articles.title: Fantilli powers Blue Jackets over Maple Leafs
articles.description: Adam Fantilli scored his second goal of the game at 4:21 of overtime to go along with an assist as the Columbus Blue Jackets survived a blown 2-0 lead in topping the Toronto Maple Leafs 3-2 on Thursday.

articles.title: Saskatoon Christian school leader receives 18-month conditional sentence
